author: Abraham Lincoln
message: Truth is generally the best vindication against slander.
title: Thought of the day

author: Anna Pavlova
message: To follow, without halt, one aim: There is the secret of success.
title: Thought of the day

author: Nelson Mandela
message: And as we let our own light shine, we unconsciously give other people permission to do the same.
title: Thought of the day

author: Ralph Emerson
message: What is a weed? A plant whose virtues have not yet been discovered.
title: Thought of the day
